work.title: Work Experience

verisk.description: Full stack developer, working mainly in backend, but also making fron end tasks when needed. Insurance web application delivering software for companies based in the London Insurance Market (Lloyd's market). International working teams with 100% comunication in english.Technologies: .NET, C#, MVC, Entity Framework, SQL Server, TypeScript, Angular, RabbitMQ, Swagger, Visual Studio, Azure Devops TFS

moochers.description: Waiter and bartender in a restaurant located by the sea in Fuengirola. Mainly working with turist customers in english.

moshimo.description: Started as a barman and waiter, motivated for a change I started working in the sushi bar and kitchen to end up as a floor manager.

work.moreExperience: More working experience in my linkedin page.

cards.description: App with mountain bike routes, personal application, where routes can be found, see the trak on a map, download the route in gpx format. Currently creating a backend with .NET technology where messages on routes will be handled, rating routes and, one day, user register and login.

Online full shop and appointment system application made as TFC to finish my studies as a web developer. Full stack Type Script application, node in back and angular in front. SQL for db and some bootstrap used. The application has a functional full shoping process, see products, filter, search and pagination. Handle user register, login, profile editing, address manager capable of having more than one address. Service appointment system managing dates and capability. And an admin side to control deliveries, appointments and needed CRUDS.
A very simple vanilla JS, HTML and CSS page made for a local handcraft artist. Use PHP to send emails in the contact form. It has information about the products, images and different contact options.
